summary: **Bel-Air** is an American drama TV show created by Morgan Cooper and others. It's a new take on the old sitcom *The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air*. The show stars Jabari Banks and many others. It first aired on Peacock in 2022, with new seasons in 2023 and 2024. The story follows a young man from West Philadelphia who moves to live with his rich aunt and uncle in Bel-Air, Los Angeles.
title: Bel-Air (TV series)
